cause.description:
Last September, Congress passed the Military Commissions Act of 2006 (MCA) which restricted habeas corpus rights, allowing the government to continue holding prisoners at Guantanamo indefinitely with no access to a fair hearing in court.
www.defendhabeas.org
1. Habeas corpus has been the bedrock of our justice system for centuries.
2. Denial of Habeas Corpus is not only unconstitutional, it is also un-American and undermines our national character.
3. Protect freedom, fairness and due process of law. Restore habeas corpus.
cause.name: Defend Habeas Corpus
